thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 3 of 59
thread.title: Danni

author: Danni
title: Danni
text: Skipper was really helpful. It was so great to have a place to organize all the hotel information and to be able to compare in one portal. And it was extremely user-friendly. SO easy to navigate. I also thought it was perfect that I was assigned an advisor- one person to manage everything for me from start to finish. I hate services where I talk to a different person every time I need something. My advisor, Michael, was very helpful. I would recommend Skipper to everyone.
